abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews six-part documentary series Breakthrough, premiering on National Geographic Channel.
lead_paragraph: This National Geographic Channel series lines up entertainers to direct episodes exploring issues like water and energy shortages, aging and pandemics.

headline.main: Review: ‘Breakthough,’ About Scientific Advances That Could Save Lives and Perhaps the Planet
headline.print_headline: Six Ways to Minister to Mankind

snippet: This National Geographic Channel series lines up entertainers to direct episodes exploring issues like water and energy shortages, aging and pandemics.
